cross|DataFlow|RecordRegistry: CHAR(10) primary key uniquely identifying each data flow record in the DataFlow table.
cross|DataFlow|FlowStamp: TIMESTAMP(6) for the moment this data flow record was created or logged. Microsecond precision.
cross|DataFlow|FlowTag: A short identifier or tag (VARCHAR(20)) for the data flow, previously 'DataFlowID'.
cross|DataFlow|OrigNation: VARCHAR(80) storing the source/origin country's name for this data flow.
cross|DataFlow|DestNation: VARCHAR(80) storing the destination country's name for this data flow.
cross|DataFlow|OrigActor: VARCHAR(150) referencing the source entity/system initiating the flow (person, organization, or app).
cross|DataFlow|DestActor: VARCHAR(150) referencing the destination entity/system receiving the flow.
cross|DataFlow|ChanProto: VARCHAR(30) for the protocol used (HTTP, FTP, SFTP, etc.). Currently possible values: (Blockchain, SFTP, Private Network, HTTPS).
cross|DataFlow|ChanFreq: VARCHAR(25) specifying how frequently data is transferred (daily, weekly, on-demand, etc.). Currently possible values: (Weekly, Hourly, Real-time, Daily).
cross|DataFlow|DataSizeMB: NUMERIC(12,2) representing the size in MB of each data transfer.
cross|DataFlow|DurMin: SMALLINT capturing the average or actual duration (in minutes) of the data flow.
cross|DataFlow|BwidthPct: NUMERIC(5,2) for bandwidth utilization percentage (0 to 100%).
cross|DataFlow|SuccessPct: NUMERIC(5,2) measuring the success rate (0–100%) of the flow attempts.
cross|DataFlow|ErrTally: SMALLINT counting the total errors or failures observed for this data flow.
cross|DataFlow|RtryTally: SMALLINT storing how many retry attempts were made after failures.
cross|RiskManagement|RiskTrace: SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each risk management record.
cross|RiskManagement|FlowLink: CHAR(10) referencing DataFlow(RecordRegistry), linking this risk record to a specific data flow.
cross|RiskManagement|RecordRegistry: CHAR(10) formerly 'RecordID'; can be used for cross-references or historical reasons.
cross|RiskManagement|RiskAssess: NUMERIC(4,2) storing the assessed risk score (0–100 or custom).
cross|RiskManagement|RiskMitState: VARCHAR(40) describing how the risk is being mitigated. Currently possible values: (Pending, Partial, Implemented).
cross|RiskManagement|SecureAction: TEXT describing security measures or controls used to reduce identified risks. Currently possible values: (Adequate, Strong, Insufficient).
cross|RiskManagement|BreachNotify: TEXT outlining the procedure for breach notification if a security event occurs. Currently possible values: (Partial, Established, Missing).
cross|RiskManagement|IncidentPlan: TEXT capturing the incident response plan or steps for handling security/operational events. Currently possible values: (Missing, Active, Outdated).
cross|RiskManagement|IncidentCount: SMALLINT counting incidents recorded for this data flow or scenario.
cross|RiskManagement|NearMissNum: SMALLINT enumerating near misses (close calls that didn't escalate).
cross|RiskManagement|AvgResolHrs: NUMERIC(5,2) average incident resolution time in hours.
cross|RiskManagement|SLApct: NUMERIC(4,2) indicating SLA (Service Level Agreement) compliance percentage (0–100%).
cross|RiskManagement|CostUSD: NUMERIC(11,2) capturing the cost of compliance in USD (security, risk measures, etc.).
cross|RiskManagement|PenUSD: NUMERIC(11,2) storing potential or actual penalty/fine risk in USD.
cross|RiskManagement|CoverageState: VARCHAR(40) describing insurance coverage status (e.g., 'Full', 'Partial', 'None'). Currently possible values for discovered data: (Limited, Adequate).
cross|RiskManagement|ResidRiskLevel: VARCHAR(40) naming the residual risk level after mitigation (Low, Medium, High, etc.). Currently possible values: (Medium, High, Low).
cross|RiskManagement|CtrlEff: NUMERIC(4,2) rating the effectiveness of current controls (0–100).
cross|RiskManagement|CompScore: NUMERIC(4,2) measuring overall compliance posture (0–100 or custom).
cross|RiskManagement|MaturityLevel: VARCHAR(40) describing the maturity of processes (Initial, Managed, Optimized, etc.). Currently possible values: (Optimized, Managed, Initial).
cross|RiskManagement|NextRevDate: DATE specifying when the next risk/compliance review is scheduled.
cross|RiskManagement|PlanState: VARCHAR(45) capturing improvement or remediation plan status (e.g., 'Planned', 'Completed'). Currently possible values: (On Track, Not Started, Delayed).
cross|DataProfile|ProfileTrace: SERIAL primary key identifying each data profile record.
cross|DataProfile|FlowSign: CHAR(10) referencing DataFlow(RecordRegistry), linking this profile to a particular data flow.
cross|DataProfile|RiskJoin: INT referencing RiskManagement(RiskTrace). Associates the data profile with a relevant risk record.
cross|DataProfile|DataType: VARCHAR(80) describing the category of data (financial, personal, logs, etc.). Currently possible values: (Commercial, Personal, Financial, Industrial, Medical).
cross|DataProfile|DataSense: VARCHAR(30) designating data sensitivity level (High, Medium, Low). Currently possible values: (High, Low, Critical, Medium).
cross|DataProfile|VolGB: NUMERIC(10,2) representing the approximate data volume in gigabytes.
cross|DataProfile|RecTally: BIGINT counting how many records exist in this data set or flow.
cross|DataProfile|SubjTally: BIGINT enumerating how many unique data subjects are impacted/contained.
cross|DataProfile|RetDays: INT storing the retention duration (in days) for this data.
cross|DataProfile|FormatType: VARCHAR(80) naming the data format (CSV, JSON, XML, proprietary, etc.). Currently possible values: (Mixed, Unstructured, Structured).
cross|DataProfile|QltyScore: NUMERIC(4,2) capturing data quality on a custom 0–100 scale.
cross|DataProfile|IntCheck: checkstatus_enum enumerating data integrity check status. Currently possible values: (Passed, Failed, Partial).
cross|DataProfile|CsumVerify: checkstatus_enum enumerating checksum verification status. Currently possible values: (Failed, Success, Pending).
cross|DataProfile|SrcValState: checkstatus_enum enumerating source validation status. Currently possible values: (Pending, Verified, Failed).
cross|DataProfile|DestValState: checkstatus_enum enumerating destination validation status. Currently possible values: (Pending, Verified, Failed).
cross|SecurityProfile|SecurityTrace: SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each security profile record.
cross|SecurityProfile|FlowKey: CHAR(10) referencing DataFlow(RecordRegistry). Associates security details with a data flow.
cross|SecurityProfile|RiskKey: INT referencing RiskManagement(RiskTrace). Links security measures to a risk record.
cross|SecurityProfile|ProfileKey: INT referencing DataProfile(ProfileTrace). Ties security info to a data profile.
cross|SecurityProfile|EncMeth: VARCHAR(40) describing the encryption method used (AES, RSA, etc.). Currently possible values: (SM4, Custom, RSA-2048, AES-256).
cross|SecurityProfile|KeyManState: VARCHAR(40) for key management status. Currently possible values: (Hybrid, Distributed, Centralized).
cross|SecurityProfile|MaskLevel: partialnone_enum enumerating data masking. Currently possible values: (Partial, Full).
cross|SecurityProfile|AnonMeth: VARCHAR(40) describing the anonymization methodology. Currently possible values: (T-Closeness, K-Anonymity, L-Diversity).
cross|SecurityProfile|PsymState: VARCHAR(40) describing pseudonymization status. Currently possible values: (Partial, Applied).
cross|SecurityProfile|AuthMeth: VARCHAR(40) specifying the authentication method (Basic, OAuth, SAML, etc.). Currently possible values: (Basic, SSO, MFA).
cross|SecurityProfile|AuthzFrame: VARCHAR(45) specifying the authorization framework (RBAC, ABAC, etc.). Currently possible values: (ABAC, Custom, RBAC).
cross|SecurityProfile|AclState: VARCHAR(30) describing the current access control status. Currently possible values: (Adequate, Strong, Weak).
cross|SecurityProfile|ApiSecState: VARCHAR(30) enumerating the API security posture. Currently possible values: (Vulnerable, Secure, Review Required).
cross|SecurityProfile|LogIntCheck: VARCHAR(30) specifying the log integrity check mechanism. Currently possible values: (Pending, Passed, Failed).
cross|SecurityProfile|LogRetDays: SMALLINT indicating how many days audit logs are retained.
cross|SecurityProfile|BkpState: VARCHAR(35) describing the backup status. Currently possible values: (Current, Failed, Outdated).
cross|SecurityProfile|DRecState: VARCHAR(35) describing the disaster recovery status. Currently possible values: (Untested, Tested, Missing).
cross|SecurityProfile|BCState: VARCHAR(35) storing the business continuity status or plan stage. Currently possible values: (Active, Outdated, Review Required).
cross|VendorManagement|VendorTrace: SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each vendor management record.
cross|VendorManagement|SecJoin: INT referencing SecurityProfile(SecurityTrace). Ties vendor data with a security profile.
cross|VendorManagement|RiskAssoc: INT referencing RiskManagement(RiskTrace). Connects vendor data to risk management info.
cross|VendorManagement|RecordRegistry: CHAR(10) an optional cross-ref field, historically 'RecordID'.
cross|VendorManagement|VendAssess: VARCHAR(40) describing vendor assessment status. Currently possible values: (Completed, In Progress, Due).
cross|VendorManagement|VendSecRate: securityrating_enum enumerating vendor security rating. Currently possible values: (A, B, C, D).
cross|VendorManagement|VendAudDate: DATE indicating when the vendor was last audited.
cross|VendorManagement|ContrState: VARCHAR(30) capturing the contract state. Currently possible values: (Active, Under Review, Expired).
cross|VendorManagement|ContrExpire: DATE specifying when the current contract expires.
cross|VendorManagement|DpaState: VARCHAR(30) referencing Data Processing Agreement status. Currently possible values: (Required, Signed, Pending).
cross|VendorManagement|SccState: VARCHAR(30) referencing Standard Contractual Clauses status. Currently possible values: (Implemented, Partial, Not Required).
cross|VendorManagement|BcrState: VARCHAR(30) capturing the status of Binding Corporate Rules. Currently possible values: (Approved, Pending, Not Applicable).
cross|VendorManagement|DocuState: VARCHAR(30) describing the vendor’s documentation completeness. Currently possible values: (Complete, Incomplete, Partial).
cross|VendorManagement|PolComp: VARCHAR(30) enumerating vendor’s policy compliance. Currently possible values: (Partial, Full, Non-compliant).
cross|VendorManagement|ProcComp: VARCHAR(30) enumerating vendor’s procedure compliance status. Currently possible values: (Non-compliant, Full, Partial).
cross|VendorManagement|TrainState: VARCHAR(30) referencing the training status of vendor employees. Currently possible values: (Due, Overdue, Current).
cross|VendorManagement|CertState: VARCHAR(30) referencing certifications the vendor holds. Currently possible values: (Pending, Expired, Valid).
cross|VendorManagement|MonState: VARCHAR(30) storing the vendor’s monitoring status or approach. Currently possible values: (Inactive, Partial, Active).
cross|VendorManagement|RepState: VARCHAR(30) capturing the vendor’s reporting requirements or status. Currently possible values: (Delayed, Current, Overdue).
cross|VendorManagement|StakeComm: TEXT detailing stakeholder communication or engagement strategy for the vendor relationship. Currently possible values: (Limited, Poor, Regular).
cross|Compliance|ComplianceTrace: SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each compliance record.
cross|Compliance|RiskTie: INT referencing RiskManagement(RiskTrace). Links compliance data to a specific risk record.
cross|Compliance|VendorTie: INT referencing VendorManagement(VendorTrace). Connects compliance info to a specific vendor record.
cross|Compliance|RecordRegistry: CHAR(10) optionally referencing an older 'RecordID'. May be used for cross references.
cross|Compliance|LegalBase: VARCHAR(150) describing the legal basis for data processing (e.g., 'Consent', 'Legal Obligation'). Currently possible values: (Legal Obligation, Contract, Legitimate Interest, Consent).
cross|Compliance|ConsentState: VARCHAR(30) capturing the status of consent (e.g., 'Obtained', 'Revoked'). Currently possible values: (Not Required, Valid, Expired, Pending).
cross|Compliance|ConsentColl: DATE indicating when user consent was collected.
cross|Compliance|ConsentExp: DATE indicating when that consent expires or needs renewal.
cross|Compliance|PurpLimit: VARCHAR(300) specifying the purpose limitation or constraints (GDPR principle). Currently possible values: (General, Multiple, Specific).
cross|Compliance|PurpDesc: TEXT describing the purpose for data processing in detail. Currently possible values: (Business Operations, Research, Marketing, Compliance).
cross|Compliance|GdprComp: compliancelevel_enum enumerating GDPR compliance level. Currently possible values: (Partial, Non-compliant, Compliant).
cross|Compliance|CcpaComp: compliancelevel_enum enumerating CCPA compliance level. Currently possible values: (Compliant, Non-compliant, Partial).
cross|Compliance|PiplComp: compliancelevel_enum enumerating PIPL compliance level. Currently possible values: (Non-compliant, Partial, Compliant).
cross|Compliance|LocLawComp: compliancelevel_enum enumerating local law compliance. Currently possible values: (Non-compliant, Compliant, Partial).
cross|Compliance|RegApprovals: VARCHAR(300) listing any regulatory approvals or licenses obtained. Currently possible values: (Obtained, Not Required, Pending).
cross|Compliance|PrivImpAssess: TEXT capturing the privacy impact assessment details or outcome. Currently possible values: (Completed, In Progress, Required).
cross|Compliance|DataSubjRight: VARCHAR(40) describing data subject rights or status (access, erasure, portability, etc.). Currently possible values: (Partial, Fully Supported, Limited).
cross|AuditAndCompliance|AuditTrace: SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each audit-and-compliance record.
cross|AuditAndCompliance|ProfJoin: INT referencing DataProfile(ProfileTrace). Ties this audit to a specific data profile.
cross|AuditAndCompliance|CompJoin: INT referencing Compliance(ComplianceTrace). Links the audit to a compliance record.
cross|AuditAndCompliance|VendJoin: INT referencing VendorManagement(VendorTrace). Connects this record to a specific vendor.
cross|AuditAndCompliance|AudTrailState: auditstatus_enum enumerating the audit trail status. Currently possible values: (Complete, Missing, Partial).
cross|AuditAndCompliance|FindTally: SMALLINT storing the count of audit findings identified.
cross|AuditAndCompliance|CritFindNum: SMALLINT counting how many critical findings were discovered.
cross|AuditAndCompliance|RemedState: VARCHAR(40) describing remediation status (e.g., 'Pending', 'In Progress'). Currently possible values: (In Progress, Not Started, Completed).
cross|AuditAndCompliance|RemedDue: DATE specifying the deadline for remediation actions.
cross|AuditAndCompliance|AuthNotify: VARCHAR(40) describing if/when authorities must be notified. Currently possible values: (Not Required, Required, Submitted).
cross|AuditAndCompliance|BorderMech: VARCHAR(40) capturing cross-border mechanism (SCC, BCR, etc.) if relevant. Currently possible values: (SCCs, Adequacy Decision, Derogations, BCRs).
cross|AuditAndCompliance|TransImpAssess: TEXT describing any transfer impact assessment for cross-border data flows. Currently possible values: (Required, Completed, In Progress).
cross|AuditAndCompliance|LocalReqs: TEXT detailing local requirements or constraints on the data flow. Currently possible values: (Not Met, Met, Partial).
cross|AuditAndCompliance|DataMapState: VARCHAR(40) describing the data mapping status (complete, partial, etc.). Currently possible values: (Partial, Complete, Outdated).
cross|AuditAndCompliance|SysIntState: VARCHAR(40) referencing the system integration status. Currently possible values: (Fully Integrated, Manual, Partial).
cross|AuditAndCompliance|AccReqNum: SMALLINT counting how many access requests have been received.
cross|AuditAndCompliance|DelReqNum: SMALLINT counting how many data deletion requests were filed.
cross|AuditAndCompliance|RectReqNum: SMALLINT counting how many rectification (correction) requests were made.
cross|AuditAndCompliance|PortReqNum: SMALLINT counting how many data portability requests were received.
cross|AuditAndCompliance|RespTimeDay: NUMERIC(4,1) capturing the average or allowed response time (days) to subject requests.
